vision: To inspire every child to reach for the stars, explore the cosmos of their imagination, and discover the magic that exists in learning, creativity, and wonder. We envision a world where children's curiosity knows no bounds and where every story, game, and activity sparks joy and knowledge.
mission: Our mission is to create engaging, educational, and entertaining content that combines the wonder of space exploration with fun learning experiences. We strive to make every child feel like a cosmic explorer, whether they're reading a story, solving a puzzle, creating art, or learning about the world around them. Through our magazine, we aim to foster creativity, curiosity, and a love for learning that will last a lifetime.

values.title: Creativity
values.description: We believe every child is creative and deserves opportunities to express their imagination through stories, art, and play.

values.title: Education
values.description: Learning should be fun! We make education engaging and accessible through interactive content, quizzes, and activities.

values.title: Safety
values.description: We prioritize child safety and create a secure, positive environment where kids can explore and learn without worries.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Every child is welcome in our cosmic playground, regardless of background, ability, or interests.

goals: Develop mobile app for easy access
